Description: Wheelmade Nile clay jar with slightly flared neck, broad shoulder and wide barrel-shaped body (cracked) with rounded base. Covered in red slip and decorated with two friezes; the first, on the shoulder demarcated by a black painted line above and two below and filled with four flowers with four petals outlined in black and filled with cream; the second frieze in the centre of the body, demarcated by two black painted lines above and below, and filled with an undulating snake in cream and black.
